mapper.sql: ID, RF_ID,BATCH_ID, SURNAME, A0100, NAME, SEX, BIRTH_DATE, IDNUMBER, REGISTE_RESIDENCE_CODE, REGISTE_RESIDENCE, WORK_UNIT, SECRET_TERM, POST, POST_CODE, PERSON_MANAGER, IDENTITY_CODE, IDENTITY, SECRET_STATUS, SECRET_DATE
mapper.select: select A0100 from oms_reg_procbatch_person where BATCH_ID = #{batchId}
mapper.insert:
insert into oms_reg_procbatch_person ( ID, RF_ID,BATCH_ID, SURNAME, A0100, NAME, SEX, BIRTH_DATE, IDNUMBER,REGISTE_RESIDENCE_CODE,REGISTE_RESIDENCE, WORK_UNIT, SECRET_TERM, POST, POST_CODE, PERSON_MANAGER, IDENTITY_CODE,IDENTITY, SECRET_STATUS, SECRET_DATE ) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.rfId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.batchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.a0100,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.surname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.birthDate,jdbcType=DATE},#{item.idnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.registeResidenceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.registeResidence,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.workUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.secretTerm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.post,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.postCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.personManager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.identityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.identity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.secretStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},#{item.secretDate,jdbcType=DATE} )
